decks.notes: This deck focuses on aggressive, creature-based strategies combined with efficient removal and powerful planeswalkers for versatility and resiliency. It aims to control the board with creatures like Tarmogoyf and Knight of the Reliquary, supported by Noble Hierarch for ramp and exalted triggers. It also uses burn spells like Lightning Bolt and removal like Swords to Plowshares to clear the way for its creatures. The inclusion of planeswalkers like Ajani Vengeant and Elspeth, Knight-Errant provide additional threats and utility, making it a well-rounded and adaptable deck in Legacy 1 vs 1 format.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly swarm the board with Goblins and overwhelm the opponent with aggressive, low-cost creatures. Using cards like Goblin Lackey and Aether Vial to cheat out creatures early, followed by powerful Goblin lords like Goblin Chieftain and Goblin Warchief to boost their stats, the deck aims to deal massive amounts of damage quickly. The deck also includes utility Goblins like Goblin Matron for tutoring and Gempalm Incinerator for removal, providing versatility in dealing with different threats while maintaining a relentless assault.

This Merfolk deck focuses on aggressive creature plays backed up by disruption spells like Force of Will and Daze. The key to its strategy lies in utilizing Aether Vial to cheat in Merfolk creatures at instant speed while controlling the opponent's resources with counterspells. Standstill provides card advantage while delaying the opponent's game plan. Lord of Atlantis boosts the power of all Merfolk creatures, while Coralhelm Commander and Merrow Reejerey provide additional synergy and support for the overall aggressive strategy. The deck aims to outpace and overwhelm the opponent with a quick and resilient board presence.

The deck focuses on generating as much mana as possible while efficiently filtering through the deck to find combo pieces. It relies on cards like Lion's Eye Diamond, Lotus Petal, Dark Ritual, Cabal Ritual, and Chrome Mox to generate mana quickly, while also utilizing cards like Thoughtseize, Preordain, Ponder, and Brainstorm to find key combo pieces and disrupt the opponent. The main win condition is using Infernal Tutor to search for Tendrils of Agony and casting a high storm count to drain the opponent's life total.

The main concept of this deck is to control the board by using counterspells like Force of Will, Counterspell, and Spell Snare, as well as utilizing Counterbalance together with Sensei's Divining Top to counter opponent spells. Additionally, the deck aims to control the field through removal spells such as Swords to Plowshares and Firespout. The deck also includes threats like Tarmogoyf and Jace, the Mind Sculptor to pressure opponents. The manabase consists of fetch lands and dual lands to ensure proper color fixing for all the spells in the deck.

The deck focuses on utilizing efficient removal spells like Swords to Plowshares and Vindicate, along with disruptive cards like Hymn to Tourach and Thoughtseize to control the opponent's resources. It also utilizes powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Knight of the Reliquary to apply pressure on the opponent while generating card advantage with Dark Confidant. The deck is able to disrupt the opponent's game plan while also maintaining a strong board presence, making it a versatile and flexible control deck in the Legacy format.

The main focus of this deck is to utilize the graveyard as a resource to quickly and consistently bring out powerful creatures such as Iona, Shield of Emeria and Woodfall Primus. Cards like Breakthrough and Careful Study allow for efficient graveyard filling, while Golgari Grave-Troll and other dredge cards help to quickly dig through the deck. The goal is to set up a combo that can quickly overwhelm the opponent with a swarm of creatures through cards like Bridge from Below and Dread Return.

This deck focuses on disrupting the opponent's strategy through various control elements such as counterspells, removal spells, and disruptive permanents. The primary goal is to maintain control of the game using cards like Jace, the Mind Sculptor and Standstill to out-value the opponent. Additionally, the deck utilizes Life from the Loam to maximize resource management and strip the opponent of their resources using cards like Wasteland. The deck's mana base is carefully crafted to support its control elements and provide consistent access to its spells.

This Bant Aggro deck focuses on quickly deploying threats like Tarmogoyf and Noble Hierarch while disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Force of Will and Stifle. The deck also has access to powerful utility cards like Natural Order and Vedalken Shackles to swing the game in its favor. By efficiently using its mana base and utilizing counter magic, this deck aims to apply pressure early and maintain board control throughout the game, culminating in a powerful finisher like Progenitus.

The main idea of this Legacy 1 vs 1 Aggro - Burn deck is to quickly deal damage to the opponent using efficient burn spells and aggressive creatures like Goblin Guide and Keldon Marauders. The deck aims to pressure the opponent's life total early on and finish them off with powerful finishers like Price of Progress, Fireblast, and Sulfuric Vortex. With a focus on dealing direct damage and overwhelming the opponent before they can stabilize, this deck is designed to be fast-paced and relentless in its pursuit of victory.

The deck focuses on quickly putting pressure on the opponent using a combination of efficient creatures and powerful Equipment cards. By disrupting the opponent's game plan with cards like Gaddock Teeg and Mangara of Corondor, and protecting your own creatures with Mother of Runes, the deck aims to control the tempo of the game. With access to powerful land destruction and creature tutoring effects, the deck can quickly overwhelm the opponent and close out the game with powerful creatures like Tarmogoyf and Knight of the Reliquary.

This deck revolves around generating large amounts of mana using High Tide and various untap effects to cast powerful spells like Time Spiral and Brain Freeze to win the game quickly. It also includes a suite of card draw and search spells to find key combo pieces, along with countermagic to protect the combo. The inclusion of Cunning Wish allows for additional versatility in finding answers and combo pieces from the sideboard. This deck aims to quickly assemble its combo pieces and overwhelm the opponent with a flurry of powerful spells.

This combo deck focuses on cheating big creatures into play early with cards like Show and Tell and Sneak Attack, allowing you to overwhelm your opponent with powerful threats like Emrakul, the Aeons Torn and Progenitus. The deck also includes disruptive cards like Force of Will and Daze to protect your combo, as well as card draw and selection spells like Brainstorm and Ponder to help you find your combo pieces quickly. The goal is to quickly ramp into your game-winning creatures and disrupt your opponent's game plan before they can react.
